page.title: 10DONINGTON ON BAIN
page.content: The village of Donington on Bain has undergone change in recent years as many working people have moved to employment in Louth,Lincoln and even further afield.The Primary school reached its peak in 1980 with 126 pupils.In 1985,the number of pupils in the school had fallen to 54. However,the village is developing slowly with new dwellings being constructed on several sites.Some beautiful old houses,including one with a preservation order,(Ivy Tree Cottage),have been demolished to make room.
